short_summary: The Department of National Defence wants to purchase pumping equipment and submit 2 separate bids.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Pump Unit, Centrifugal Procurement Notice**
=====================================

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01009130
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-237303/A

The Department of National Defence has issued a request for proposals (RFP) to provide a Pump Unit, Centrifugal to support various Defence projects. We encourage interested suppliers to review the RFP documents and submit their proposals electronically via Canada's procurement platform.

**Procurement Details:**
------------------------

The requirement includes two (2) items:

* GSIN: 4320B (Pumps, Centrifugal)
	+ Item 1: 5 units of a Pump Unit, Centrifugal (Part No.: 2BE6.5HCG, NCAGE: 15852) to be delivered to CFSD Montreal by December 15th, 2022
	+ Item 2: 5 units of a Pump Unit, Centrifugal (Part No.: 2BE6.5HCG, NCAGE: 15852) to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton by December 15th, 2022

**Submission Guidelines:**
-------------------------

Prospective suppliers must submit their proposals electronically through the Canada's procurement platform (canadabuys.canada.ca). Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Important Notes:**
----------------------

* Due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, reduced business hours may be applicable at the specified bid receiving Unit.
* Suppliers are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service to avoid any disruptions.
* Documents submitted must comply with the solicitation requirements and specifications outlined in the RFP document.

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

For any queries related to this procurement, please contact:

* **Name:** Danny Lebel
* **Email:** [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)

**Reference Documents:**
------------------------

A copy of the RFP document in both English and French can be accessed through the following links:

* [English RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/f2587d7e243ea31edd7ec555f818ff20/w8485-237303a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf)
* [French RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/
